title: Bug: Refactoring deleting fields context menu is overridden by message dialog
description: When conducting a refactoring operation to delete fields, the context menu is overridden by a message dialog.
OB: When trying to delete fields using the context menu, no context menu is displayed. Instead, a message dialog immediately prompts the user if they want to delete the getter/setter as well.
EB: When trying to delete fields using the context menu, the expected behavior is for the context menu to be displayed, allowing the user to choose the appropriate actions, including deleting the getter/setter if desired.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Setup JUnit. 
2. Attempt to delete fields using the context menu.
